title: Strengthening CS Practical Competencies: Professional Skill Development Project Using Digital Storytelling

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can produce three or more professional scenario-based digital storytelling projects to effectively convey social contexts.
Learners achieve over 80% in professionalism and technical completeness of storytelling projects through peer assessment.
Learners enhance their ability to systematically analyze and present complex social issues using digital media (video/infographics) to a measurable level defined by a rubric.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
